contents.key: Is it possible to send and reply to SMS?
contents.content: Is it possible to send and reply to SMS?

contents.key: Answer: Is it possible to send and reply to SMS?
contents.content: SMS can only be received.

contents.key: Who can see our conversations?
contents.content: Who can see our conversations?

contents.key: Answer: Who can see our conversations?
contents.content: Chat conversations can only be viewed by your estate management company and the person themselves.

contents.key: Can I use the chat for free?
contents.content: Can I use the chat for free?

contents.key: Answer: Can I use the chat for free?
contents.content: All are available free of charge. (Communication charges not included)

contents.key: Is there a call function?
contents.content: Is there a call function?

contents.key: Answer: Is there a call function?
contents.content: we don't have a call function. This is a chat service.

contents.key: What browsers are supported?
contents.content: What browsers are supported?

contents.key: Answer: What browsers are supported?
contents.content: All browsers are supported.

contents.key: How do I set the language?
contents.content: How do I set the language?

contents.key: Answer: How do I set the language?
contents.content: Press the Menu button in the upper right of the chat screen and select the 'Language Settings'.Select the desired language and press the 'Change' button to change the language settings.

contents.key: What changes when I change the language settings?
contents.content: What changes when I change the language settings?

contents.key: Answer: What changes when I change the language settings?
contents.content: The display on the chat will be in the language you selected.Messages from the estate manager will also be displayed in the translated version.Please note that messages that were sent before you changed your language settings will not be translated.

contents.key: What are notification settings?
contents.content: What are notification settings?

contents.key: Answer: What are notification settings?
contents.content: Chat notifications can be sent to LINE messages.

contents.key: How do I set up notifications?
contents.content: How do I set up notifications?

contents.key: Answer: How do I set up notifications?
contents.content: To set up notifications, press the menu button in the upper right of the chat screen and select the 'Notification Settings'.Turn on 'Link with LINE' and press the 'OK' button.The LINE application will automatically launch and follow the instructions to add LINE Notify to your LINE friends.The chat notifications will be sent to LINE by doing the steps above.

contents.key: How do I change my phone number?
contents.content: How do I change my phone number?

contents.key: Answer: How do I change my phone number?
contents.content: Press the Menu button in the upper right of the chat screen and select the 'Phone Number Settings'.Enter your desired phone number in the 'New Phone Number' field and press the 'Change' button to reflect the change.

contents.key: What is the chat list?
contents.content: What is the chat list?

contents.key: Answer: What is the chat list?
contents.content: In the chat list, you can see a list of threads and the latest messages.Pressing on a message will take you to the screen of that conversation.

contents.key: How do I open the menu?
contents.content: How do I open the menu?

contents.key: Answer: How do I open the menu?
contents.content: It can be opened by pressing the button in the upper right of the chat screen.

contents.key: Which languages are supported?
contents.content: Which languages are supported?

contents.key: Answer: Which languages are supported?
contents.content: Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Hindi, Thai, Malay, Indonesian, Vietnamese, and Nepali are supported.
